fields.name: datum
fields.description: Date of Wednesdays of a week. The data of the underlying individual time series are averaged within the period from the previous Thursday to the specified Wednesday.

fields.name: n
fields.description: Number of locations that have transmitted at least one measured value in the period defined by "date".

fields.name: anteil_bev
fields.description: Proportion of the total population in Germany that is connected to the transmitting sewage treatment plants.

fields.name: viruslast
fields.description: Measured viral load (in gene copies per liter averaged over all sites and, for SARS-CoV-2, weighted by connected inhabitants of the wastewater treatment plants). Before averaging across the sites, all measured values of the sites in the last 7 days were transformed using the logarithm of 10 and averaged across the individual sites. The indicated viral load is the mean value transformed back to the original scale.

fields.name: loess_vorhersage
fields.description: Predicted viral load (predicted using a LOESS regression, transformed back to the original scale).

fields.name: loess_obere_schranke
fields.description: Upper bound of the 95% confidence interval of the LOESS predicted value.

fields.name: loess_untere_schranke
fields.description: Lower bound of the 95% confidence interval of the LOESS predicted value.

fields.name: normalisierung
fields.description: Indicates whether individual time series were normalized by flowrate (`ja`=yes, `nein`=no).
